test.name: change_P for 2d should equal domain_length*visc*darcy_vel_BC/perm, check relative difference to be under tolerance 1.5e-09

pass_tests.test: change_P = abs(max(pressure_2d) - min(pressure_2d)) visc = 1.0e-04 darcy_vel_BC = 5.0 perm = 1.0e-10 domain_length = 300.0 print 'Relative error of pressure difference: ',abs((change_P - domain_length*visc*darcy_vel_BC/perm)/(domain_length*visc*darcy_vel_BC/perm)) assert abs((change_P - domain_length*visc*darcy_vel_BC/perm)/(domain_length*visc*darcy_vel_BC/perm)) < 1.5e-09

test.name: interstitial velocity 2d should equal darcy_vel/porosity), check relative difference to be under tolerance 1.5e-09

pass_tests.test: analytic_vel = 10.0 print 'Relative error of interstitial velocity: ',abs((inter_vel_2d - analytic_vel)/analytic_vel) assert abs((inter_vel_2d - analytic_vel)/analytic_vel) < 1.5e-09
